This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a product worth $10,000 to you at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
